website_summaries.verdict: An impressive personal blender with a 1,000-watt motor that's great for smoothies, although it can get a bit loud.
pros: Comes with an 18-ounce and 24-ounce container along with two sip and seal lids
Auto-iQ means there are pre-programmed settings at the touch of a button

website_summaries.verdict: This powerful little blender is also a great value, as well as a good choice for consumers who need a smaller but capable model.
pros: Compact model that is perfect for personal use yet is also powerful enough for cooking applications
1000-watt motor combined with proprietary self-adjusting Auto-iQ technology equals outstanding results
cons: On the noisy side, but the dependable performance makes up for this minor inconvenience

customer_reviews.title: Ninja must have
customer_reviews.text: I love it!! Takes control, does what you want it to do however it is a bit loud.
customer_reviews.author: Glenda Brammer

customer_reviews.title: Powerful intelligent design, real smooth results
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding results after 2 weeks of using it. Strong enough for ice and frozen berries and carrots, but also makes a fine puree smooth creamy results. Tried Oster and a KitchenAid, and the large standard Ninj, and this turns out to be the best product for me. The larger Ninja blender was powerful and fast but results were always grainy, large particles pieces remained, never fine and creamy.
customer_reviews.author: RickWAllen

customer_reviews.title: Great for Smoothies
customer_reviews.text: I had a Bullet and it stopped working less then a year but I did use it everyday and loved it. I decided to try this Ninja instead of replacing with a Bullet due to the short life span. I love the Ninja. Seems to be more powerful , easy to clean and does a wonderful job of making smoothie , soups and sauces. I only gave it a three star on durability because I just received the product so Ill have to see how long it last. Such an excellent price also.
customer_reviews.author: Antioch

customer_reviews.title: Good product, however...
customer_reviews.text: This blender was advertised as coming with 18, 24, and 32 oz jars. The enclosed booklet shows several receipes that need to be prepared with a 32oz jar. I have purchased numerous products from Amazon without problems please don't let this be the first. BTW: above where it states "Create Review" shows 32/24/18 oz jars. I'll give this product a rating after we use it for awhile. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Larry R.

customer_reviews.title: Sucks don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Lid comes loose during blending no matter how tight it is put on and it leaks making a splatter mess. I spend much time cleaning base. Also the drinking lids are hard to get on straight. Now after 2 months it smells like sour milk. The leaks have gone inside the unit so I’m sure won’t last long.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So awesome! Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this ninja 4 times for my morning protein smoothies and I absolutely love it. I’m so happy I went with the 1000 watt ninja. It takes up very little space on my RV counter and looks sleek and nice. I also really like that it’s super easy to clean. It came packaged very well.
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Wrong items received
customer_reviews.text: Does not match the motor base and gear on this item
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for smoothies and fast!
customer_reviews.text: So glad I bought this blender!! I make daily smoothies and this blender I tell you is super powerful and fast st blending!! Has different key functions for your needs.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda N.

customer_reviews.title: An Easier Way to Make Smoothies.
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought the Nutri Ninja Pro (BL456). When I saw this one on sale, I took a chance. And let me tell you, I only wish I would have bought it sooner. This thing does the whole smoothie / shake all by itself. It has a self blending feature so I don't have to push it down. And it also does it all on its own with a timer so it blends the perfect smoothie all the time.
customer_reviews.author: manoCUEVA

customer_reviews.title: Product Description is Wrong. - No 32 oz. jar is included with the 480d
customer_reviews.text: This item works very well, but the product description (32/24/18) is wrong. A 32 oz jar is not included, only 24 and 18 oz jars come with this model. I bought this expecting a 32 oz jar, and am very disappointed that it was not included. I called Amazon to attempt to get a 32 oz jar, but they said the only think I could do was to return the item. Not sure if i want to do that, especially since it works well otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Claire Breswick

customer_reviews.title: Bad purchase
customer_reviews.text: Warning... this item is EXTREMELY, abnormally loud. Not satisfied at all. When contacting Ninja customer service, they were not helpful at all. They told me I would have to pay to ship it back to them so they can "test it out" and then send us a new one, or the same one back to us. (All the while being out of a blender)... very disappointing...
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Parra

customer_reviews.title: !Caution! deceiving description
customer_reviews.text: Only gave 3 star because description says 32/24/18, giving you the idea it comes with all these cup sizes. When you click on it, the details inside only mention 24 and 18 oz, but I missed this and thought I was getting all 3 sizes. I needed the 32 oz, so I had to order separately. Someone should fix the description so more people are not inconvenienced, plus it cost me more than if I got the model that comes with the size I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't connect
customer_reviews.text: Tried using it twice. Pulled out instructions the 2nd time because how difficult it was the first time. You're supposed to line up the notches on the canister and turn slightly. It took skin the first time but worked and it was a good smoothie. And time I could never get it to blend of connect. Bummed about this
customer_reviews.author: Kristen B

customer_reviews.title: Simple, easy to clean smooth maker
customer_reviews.text: Works great for smoothies. Sometimes you will need to shake the cup to get stuff to mix all the way depending on how thick you make smoothies. We use frozen fruits, yogurt and lemonade or sunny D and it works great as long as you have enough liquid. Way easier to clean than the standard ninja, mix it up, put in a straw and your done. We put our cups in the dishwasher with no issues, and just rinse off the blade top.
customer_reviews.author: AH

customer_reviews.title: Great,  but loud
customer_reviews.text: Makes my keto coffee perfectly. Con is that it's very loud
customer_reviews.author: Scott Chamberlin

customer_reviews.title: Bad blender
customer_reviews.text: Bought July 4 th 2019 . As of October 10 th 2019 no longer works . Call shank they want 20 dollars shipping and handling to replace the unit which only cost 70 dollars brand new . Which I already paid shipping on when I bought it 3 months ago . A brand new product that last 3 months isn’t worth another 20 dollars . I wouldn’t buy shark or ninja ever again . Spend your money on something better . Enjoy
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: VERY LOUD
customer_reviews.text: This Ninja is extremely loud. I have to walk 2across the room away from it while it's running! Motor quit working just days after the return window lapsed. Called support and they will replace the unit, but it will cost me $20 for shipping! Threw it in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Shani Grove

customer_reviews.title: Plenty of Power
customer_reviews.text: Don't worry about power, this thing will blend anything you throw into it! This has provided silky smooth results every time. My last blender was a traditional glass blender, what a nightmare to clean that was... but this Ninja is a dream when it comes to cleanup time. The only thing I wish this could be better is with the noise level - I would not recommend using it very early or late if you live in an apartment.
customer_reviews.author: HonestReviewer

customer_reviews.title: Easy-to-Use Powerhouse
customer_reviews.text: Fill it to the line with frozen fruit and the thickest Greek Yogurt you can buy and just push the IQ button, then step away while it does its magic. The IQ feature spins, stalls, spins, stalls in a way that renders a perfectly smooth smoothie in one minute. The bad news is that it sounds like a Ninja Motorcycle Race but it really does a great job very quickly and effortlessly.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Boone

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: This blender is the best at blending of the blenders if had in the past. It definitely makes my protein drinks smooth, crushing the ice without leaving chunks. The different size cups are nice and easy to clean. I only gave 4 stars because it is SOO loud! I read reviews that said it was loud however didn’t imagine it would be to the point where I typically try to walk out of the room due to the noise level. They really should try to find a way to buffer the noise.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: WHAT!!??? I CAN’T HEAR YOU!
customer_reviews.text: So loud it scares my 1 1/2 year old grandson. And after just 5 months it’s leaking like a sieve. I’m not sure what else I can say about it. It blended and pulverized ice and frozen fruit into smoothies, albeit loudly, right up until it sprang a leak.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Great size!  Love this for every day use
customer_reviews.text: Loving this blender. It fits perfect on my counter and I don’t need to move it out to blend. The small cup is big enough for one or two small children. The larger cup is a good amount for 2. It is quite loud, but it blends like a champ
customer_reviews.author: Stacy G

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS BLENDER!
customer_reviews.text: First an foremost, it's very loud. I live in an apartment and it's so loud - but I checked and my neighbors can't hear it. I make a smoothie every morning and they come out perfect! I use a lot of frozen fruit and this little machine breaks everything down with no problem. I use this over my VitaMix!
customer_reviews.author: Katie W.

customer_reviews.title: It works really well.
customer_reviews.text: Just got it yesterday. It is REALLLY LOUD. Any review mentioning that is not exaggerating. However, it's a blender, they're all loud. This seems to do a really good job with smoothies. They're very smooth with no hint of strawberry seeds or any random bits like my old cheap Oster blended would leave. I wish it was a tad quieter and the cups were glass, not plastic. Overall definitely happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: It's not just loud..
customer_reviews.text: ..it is chainsaw loud. Can't use it if anyone in the house is studying or sleeping. Same for the neighbors. Has impressive power and crushes ice for a cold smoothie in one minute. Thing is well constructed and feels heavy including the cup plastic, which you need because there is a natural concern that it could explode like a grenade. They need to ridge up the cup because it will slip out of your hand easily if wet and held upside down to place on the base. That's a design flaw they should have caught and would cost them nothing to fix. Whenever I find design flaws, I wonder what else they overlooked.
customer_reviews.author: jackstraw

customer_reviews.title: Powerful, smooth blending.
customer_reviews.text: Yes, it is loud! But worth it for the beautiful, smooth blending POWER! I need to get the 32oz blending container. If it weren't for the fill line, the 24 oz would be big enough, but you do need to leave space for the blades, especially with chunky or frozen items. I love that a flip lid to-go top is included. Also love the suction cup base to hold it in place so the vibrational energy doesn't throw it off the counter. Don't plan on having your spouse sleep through it while making a breakfast smoothie for work, even 3 rooms away. Lol I'm glad I finally bought this blender, it's so much better than my previous one.
customer_reviews.author: Jami Lee

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this blender! It works so so well for all my needs. I make a lot of smoothies with frozen fruit, ginger, etc and it makes it so smooth! There is no big mess to clean up, the base stays clean no matter what. I really only need to wash the blending top with water after use and it all seals very well. Probably best purchase I’ve made in 2020! I’m not sure how they would take away the noise level. It’s super loud in my small house but I don’t care haha.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: after watching hundreds of YouTube videos on different blenders, I gladly settled here. Couldn't be happier. Smoothies for me, milkshakes for the kids, and frozen margaritas for the wife. It does it all and it gets used daily in some capacity. I love everything about it. Easy to use, easy to clean. The noise doesn't bother me, but if i lived in an apartment/condo I could see it bothering neighbors depending on placement.
customer_reviews.author: Matthews

customer_reviews.title: Love this for Smoothies
customer_reviews.text: The cons: it’s loud The pros: After you come to terms with your blender’s refusal to be silent, you’ll love this thing. It just works. Follow recipe formations, and you’ll be good to go every time. I’ve used this daily for the last few months, and encountered no issues. The blender cups are good quality and clean easily. I mostly do smoothies, but an easy guac or salsa can be made too. I’ve had my ninja blender for nearly a decade, so I’m hoping this thing has decent longevity too. Don’t really understand the low star reviews. For the money, this can’t be beat.
customer_reviews.author: Mail Debaser

customer_reviews.title: Loud but easy to clean and awesome
customer_reviews.text: This blender is ridiculous, I absolutely love it. Ever since I got I I have used it every day. It’s powerful and has been able to deal with ice and frozen fruit and all without any issues. The IQ feature is nice that you can just set it and come back in a minute or so. It is so easy to clean too. Definitely think it is worth it to buy the extra cups It is pretty loud to the point that I keep it in my garage but I don’t remember any blenders that were quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Esslinger

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: So the blender worked well for about 8 months...then it seemed to lose power and had a funny smell...yay a 1yr warranty! Call and the item I paid around $50 for had a shipping fee to replace the motor for 19.95. So I ask if I could just get a discount on a new one since is was debating on getting extra cups and such, and I was quoted more than the cost from Amazon and still a 19.95 shipping fee. That was the best offer I could be provided for a product failing with it's first year of service.
customer_reviews.author: Cati Journell

customer_reviews.title: Works great!  I should have bought one a long time ago!!
customer_reviews.text: Blends better than I imagined. Very easy to use. Clean up is simple and fast. The recipe book that comes with it is a great starting point. I have consumed more veggies and fruits (and protein powder) in the last week than I probably did in the entire month before thanks to this easy to use device. Yes, it is loud, but I press the blend button and leave the room, so it is not a big deal. My only criticism is that the lids seem to be difficult to line up and get on. I'm still rating it 5 stars however because the clean up process is so easy it makes up for the lid and the noise.
customer_reviews.author: Jason L

customer_reviews.title: Works well but is the loudest appliance I have ever owned.
customer_reviews.text: The headline says it all. This this is a blending monster but is unbelievably loud. I have even tried setting on a soft pad while blending...little to no sound dampening at all. Cleaning is fairly easy but as someone else mentioned, the gasket in the blending cap should be removed periodically to keep it from getting nasty and smelly. I recommend a dental pick or other tool to pull the gasket out out for cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: MSchene

customer_reviews.title: This is far better than Nutribullet Pro for about the same price
customer_reviews.text: I've owned several different models of Ninjas and Nutribullets. This is comparable to the Nutribullet RX--which costs more--but better in that it doesn't leak and it is easier to clean, while having the same auto-blend and shutoff capability. Pricewise, it is the same as the Nutribullet Pro, which in my opinion, sucks--it is far noisier, and the push tab system is flawed (customer service for Nutribullet is useless on this) and will get stuck 75% of the time so either it doesn't blend or it won't stop blending. Go with the Nutri Ninja instead. If you use the Nutri Ninja mainly for blending smoothies and extracting/juicing, this is a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: K.L.

customer_reviews.title: Powerful but LOUD
customer_reviews.text: Super powerful. VERY VERY loud. Even during normal hours of the day I feel guilty for using it cuz we live in an apt complex. Nice to have features for ultra blend and normal (they have their own pulse rates for 45sec or so) you just click and can walk away (maybe into a sound proof room ahah) Wish it came with some kind of stOrage or something for the blade- it’s super sharp and hard to store (even a plastic cover for it so it can be upright on the counter)
customer_reviews.author: Ben Li Bramli

customer_reviews.title: Nice blender
customer_reviews.text: This performed as I expected. I read reviews prior to my purchase and expected it to be extremely loud. Don’t get me wrong it is loud but I previously owned a nutribullet and the Ninja is just a little louder. What I like about this model is the different speeds for blending. My smoothie this morning did not have any clumps of frozen fruit - truly a smoothie! I will update my post if it fails to perform long term.
customer_reviews.author: Lkc

customer_reviews.title: Must have been a previously returned item.  It was dirty, scratched and sticky,  Missing 24 oz cup.
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointing, I actually couldn’t tell you how well this product works. The blender I received had clearly been previously returned. It was dirty, scratched up and still sticky from the previous owners use. It was also missing the 24 oz cup. I am little surprised that I appliance used to prepare food would be delivered in such poor condition.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Now you can drink your veggies. Yummy!
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that I can drink my fiber. My whole system is working better and my skin looks clearer on my arms. I am old and get those old person bruises. This seems to be helping. It is so easy to use and clean I use it at least once daily. I put sweet potatoes, apples, salad greens or spinach, yogurt, black cumin oil, liquid vitamin b, and frozen fruit into yogurt and add enough almond milk to process. I don't mind the noise anymore.
customer_reviews.author: SilverGirl

customer_reviews.title: FYI: LOUD, VERY LOUD. But powerful enough to do the job!
customer_reviews.text: *update 3/3/2020* I still love this blender. It's still very loud, but I've used it to make smoothies, milkshakes, even hummus although I had to add some extra liquid to get everything blended so it's a bit runny. Definitely very happy with this buy!! Only used it once, I'll try to come back and update in a few months. First thing: all the reviews are right - this thing is LOUD!!! Plug your ears loud. Seriously. My toddler was scared and ran away also lol But it's easy to clean, suctions to your counter top. I'm looking forward to using it everyday for lunch smoothies!
customer_reviews.author: MECH

customer_reviews.title: Why do I need another blender?
customer_reviews.text: I bought this rather sleek little device because I got sold on these REALLY expensive health shakes, which I am actually enjoying, and didn't want to dirty two things (the blender and a glass) when I could just dirty the blender. And talk about power! Wow, this thing could crush big rocks into small rocks, not unlike the penitentiaries of old. It's SO powerful there are suction cups on the bottom so it doesn't move on the counter. So - love it, use it every day - and someday may even try making something from the cool recipe book that's included. Maybe... HIGHLY recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Spencer-Wolff

customer_reviews.title: Noisy but powerful blending capabilities
customer_reviews.text: My mom and I bought this auto IQ blender for my brother as a birthday gift. He uses it primarily for smoothies. After using another similar product faithfully for many years, we agree that this product does not blend oats as smoothly as the previous blender we had. This blender is also significantly noisier. However, the mixture of pulsing and blending as well as the digital countdown features are pretty sweet!
customer_reviews.author: Tissan Howard

customer_reviews.title: Average blender, blades can start to wear out soonish, decent utility value for its price.
customer_reviews.text: At first, the blending power/blades really did the job well. After about a month or so (I use it everyday to blend mostly green leafy veggies, carrots, radish & celery) I started to notice that the pulp is a lot more dense. Maybe the blades started to wear out. The noise is high, but not unacceptable, just like any other blender. The rubber lining in the cup can be hard to get out to clean. Outside of these, pretty decent, average blender, utility value for what I paid for it, esp. since I use it everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Alpha

customer_reviews.title: works great but very loud
customer_reviews.text: It is really powerful and does a good job at blending frozen fruit for smoothies. I can't wait to make salsa with it. It is easy to use and to clean. But omg it is soooo loud! Louder than a vacuum or any other motorized device I own. I have to cover my ears when using it and it scares my cat and I am sure all my apartment neighbors can hear. Luckily it works in about 60 seconds so its only horrible for a brief moment. Also being in an apartment i can't use it late at night or early in the morning out of courtesy so that's a bummer if i get up early or work night shift.
customer_reviews.author: Ahoney

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product. Must have for every kitchen
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 11 year old daughter so she could make smoothies. She always wanted to use my food processor. My food processor is just too dangerous for children. Hell, its dangerous for adults. This Ninja is AMAZING!!! Both my kids love it! They make smoothies everyday. I’m happy they are making healthy choices. It makes the best “grown up” drinks too. Better than any blender. This is better than any blender by far. Now I just need more of the cups so we have enough for the rest of the family.
customer_reviews.author: HLJAAEJEJH

customer_reviews.title: Super smooth
customer_reviews.text: This is great for smoothies and protein shakes. I’ve used other small personal blenders as well as the big Oster blenders and this works the best by far. Using my big Oster, my smoothies were clumpy and full of air bubbles. This thing gives you nice, smooth shakes with ZERO ice clumps or chips. Only negative is the thing is LOUD but I knew that when I bought it and would still buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Arnold

customer_reviews.title: Awesome! Wish I would have bought sooner
customer_reviews.text: This is not all that loud!!! A lot of the reviews said it was very loud but I don't think so. It has SO MUCH power and blends up very smoothly. I use it almost daily and haven't had a problem since purchase! the only thing I didn't like were the attachable lids that it comes with....once I came home from work and it had gotten stuff on the cup....not sure why but maybe because it sat all day and I didn't wash it so the smoothies liquid was in the groves from twisting it on that morning! VERY easy to clean! and it honestly doesn't take up a lot of counter space!
customer_reviews.author: Rachael

customer_reviews.title: Powerful
customer_reviews.text: Well built. Strong blades. Easily chops through ice. 5 stars. Note: There are two IQ blend programs. These do not sense the food and blend accordingly. Each simply runs through a preset program of pulsing and blending. Both work well, but the unit is not “smart” in the sense that it senses how the food needs processed. Also, this unit is one speed only .... you can pulse, blend or run one of two programs, but they all run at the same speed. Still, an excellent unit.
customer_reviews.author: CooperandBrownDog

customer_reviews.title: Wow!  Phenomenal blender with lots of versatility!
customer_reviews.text: One of my best purchases! I use it almost every single day for my smoothies, juicing, and to purée baby food. This blender is extremely powerful and you can hear and feel the power in it when it turns on. Not very quiet by any means but I don’t care when I know this thing is going to town doing serious work on any and everything I throw in it. I find it easy to clean and couldn’t be happier with its reliability and functions it has to offer. I prefer this over a vita mix for the price point for sure!
customer_reviews.author: lorenzo

customer_reviews.title: so. loud.
customer_reviews.text: I needed a blender upgrade because I started subscribing to Daily Harvest. I was going from an old retro Waring Pro blender so the bar was low. I just wanted a blender that actually blended. I picked the Ninja because it seemed to have the blending power I was looking for at an affordable price. I've been using it daily for about a month and my smoothies are SMOOTH. But the blender is so loud I need to wear my son's noise cancelling headphones or leave the room when I use it. I mean, SO loud. I love everything else about it.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Easy to clean. A little loud.
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Put some heavier stuff at the very bottom (which becomes the top when you flip it). Put the most coarse stuff down by the blade. Works great. It's loud, but it works good when you order your stuff as I just described. Love mine.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Michael Hyman

customer_reviews.title: Game changer blender!
customer_reviews.text: I've owned the same expensive blender for around 10 years and it was my most loved kitchen appliance as I make a massive smoothie most mornings. I finally needed to replace it and decided to try a Nutri-bullet style blender. I came across this one after a lot of research and decided to try it. I put a lot into my smoothies (Oats, frozen fruits nuts, powders, berries, greens, etc.) and this handles it all. It's pretty loud but it works amazingly. I live alone so it's fine but if you have a family and a small house you probably don't want to use this before 7AM! Still think it's incredible though especially when I upgraded to a 32oz container.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Kingsley

customer_reviews.title: Loud
customer_reviews.text: Love it, blends well. Was less loud when I moved it away from the wall, and covered the base with a towel.
customer_reviews.author: RR

customer_reviews.title: LOUD!
customer_reviews.text: Anyone who says this isn't loud has hearing loss. It is extremely loud - so loud that we ended up buying another product to put it in while it runs. The noise is truly terrible and you're kidding yourself if you don't think it is. It is very powerful and makes fantastic smoothies - they taste much better than my previous smoothie maker. I like the size of the cups and they have a nice big opening so you don't end up spilling protein powder on the counter and they are easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer T

customer_reviews.title: Works Well.  Very Loud!
customer_reviews.text: All blenders we've owned are loud, but this thing is painfully loud. The kids run from the room, I need to hold my ears for the 45 seconds while it runs through its program "blend" cycle. Loudest part of the noise isn't the motor, the small blend containers seem to amplify the sound to a harsh level. The results are great. No bits and pieces from blueberries, strawberry seeds, or spinach. Just place it in the pantry or someplace it won't wake the neighbors and you'll be happy.
customer_reviews.author: M Jon

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Machine!
customer_reviews.text: Just made my lunch smoothie with the machine. I was using a Cuisinart personal blender for the last few years, It worked but I had to switch between pulse and blend. It also was just OK on power. The Ninja is a beast! Everything is automatic and it blends MUCH finer. Noise? Can't lie, it is a little noisy but much quieter than the Cuisinart. It comes with suction cups on the bottom so it doesn't move around while blending. Very easy to clean, I add water and a drop of soap and hit blend. Viola instantly clean. It was bought as an impulse on sale glad I made the purchase. Very Happy
customer_reviews.author: Harry

customer_reviews.title: Great blender!
customer_reviews.text: We got this because we live in a van and our traditional style blender just used too much water and time to clean. We love this! My mom has the lower model and she loves hers. Works great, and so easy to clean. I usually rinse really well and then add hot water to the cup and blend it. Only really wash it with soap as needed once in awhile. This model also has suction cups on the bottom which is fantastic for us as we need it to stay put on the counter while driving! We usually pack it away during long drives but otherwise have not had an issues
customer_reviews.author: Madison Jones

customer_reviews.title: Blendiferous!
customer_reviews.text: This thing gets the job done, but man is it loud. How loud? Difficult to have a conversation when this thing is running. I moved this to a hallway between my kitchen and dining room just to take a break from the noise. The blending is superb. It came with two cups, two caps, and the blade mechanism. The settings are intuitive and it’s very easy to operate.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Rubber piece in base must be removed and cleaned after each blend
customer_reviews.text: Rubber piece in the blade section must be removed after every blend. Food particles get stuck between the rubber piece and the plastic base. I jab it out with a fork every time. It is a PITA. But blend power is great. Noise level unacceptable you cannot run this especially at night if you live in an apt. Overall 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: slicksun

customer_reviews.title: Loud, but I still love it!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product literally every day. Sometimes twice a day. It's just so easy to throw a few items in the jar and hit blend. It is crazy loud, but it's a blender, so I don't really care. It has done a great job at blending up ice and frozen fruit. I've never had any issues with it getting stuck. There is something mentally about getting a little cup out versus a big blender jar. I have a vitamin (that I also love), but the idea of pulling it out and making too much green smoothie, etc, usually means I just don't make a smoothie. I love this! I'm convincing my Mom to order one as well.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality blender
customer_reviews.text: I make a lot of smoothies and I wanted a designated blender that could sit on the counter for easy access. This is a great blender. It's powerful and does a good job crushing all the ice and frozen fruit I throw in. The smoothies come out just as creamy and smooth as they do in my full size Nutri-ninja blender. My only complaint is that it's LOUD. Really loud. But I don't know if you will find a quieter blender that will do a quality job in that price range, so it's not a deterrent.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Will break after a short period of use
customer_reviews.text: I make smoothies daily with no unusual ingredients- just fresh fruit, vegetables and juice. I have had 3 of these machines stop working within about 3 months! The first one broke down after about a year, so I bought a second one. Within about 2 weeks the second one broke down, so the company sent me another one free. About a month later, this one broke down again! Hopeless!!!
customer_reviews.author: Large Dude

customer_reviews.title: Obnoxiously loud!
customer_reviews.text: Had I used this machine within the First 30 days after I purchased it but i would have returned it. Lesson learned! This blender is so obnoxiously loud that I can’t understand how this machine passed any inspections because the decibel level is so high that it actually hurts my ears so I wear ear plugs while using the machine, during the day btwn 9am - 10pm so I do not disturb my neighbors. The blender works well but because of the noise level, I don’t recommend purchasing it.
customer_reviews.author: zz

customer_reviews.title: A powerful blender that lives up to expectations!
customer_reviews.text: This product was given as a gift to a special friend who is not very handy in the kitchen. After much research, I determined that the Nutri Ninja blender was the best for his needs in terms of size & ease of operation. He has really enjoyed using it for health smoothies, the main reason he wanted a blender. I have been using an older Ninja Food Processor & Blender "combo" that is still operable, & decided that this new Nutri Ninja blender would be a great gift. And, so far, he enjoys using this blender very much. In fact, our family now refers to him as the "Smoothie Pro"!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Noise level
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product since March, it does mix good. It is so loud I have to put on ear muffs to stay in the room. Very annoying. It also occasionally smells like the motor is burning up. it also vibrates so bad I had to move it away from the seam on my counter top for fear of it loosening the seam. I use it almost every morning to make 2 protein shakes, I DO NOT recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for all your blending needs...wouldn't have any other brand now.
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd. 1st one had a difficult switching mechanism and eventually made it impossible to operate. Liked it much when it functioned, so I ordered a new one. This one I am NOW reviewing has a completely new "switching system" that eliminates ALL the problems I had with the 1st. Overall review? One great piece of equipment for my morning protein shakes and for any other related use I have used it for. Don't think you can go wrong, AND price is right.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Grace

customer_reviews.title: blends very well on frozen on smoothies, but loud and small capacity
customer_reviews.text: I brought this smoothie and use it about two days It blend very well and I like the automatic blending buttons for it plus having a cap for it to drink it is a nice touch. The problem is that even the big cup has small space in there which is a draw back you have to use the right amount of food there or else you won't be able to close the cap for a big mess. Plus the blender is LOUD so if you don't mind the noise level for the blender than this is good for you.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Barut

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend
customer_reviews.text: It does a great job! I bought this about a year ago and I’ve had no issues with it. It will leak and spill but that’s only when I over load it beyond the max level. It would be nice if there was an easier way to be able to clean the blade part of it where the ring lays but popping the rubber ring with a sharp knife works well enough to get it out and clean so that it doesn’t get mold from stuck on food.
customer_reviews.author: Velia Balderrama

customer_reviews.title: New Ninja Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: This has to be one of the easiest blenders I have ever used. If you need to make something quick and easy this has you, just grab a portable cup, put your ingredients in, and blend! You'll be out the door in 5 minutes if you're prepared! I love that they sell bigger cup sizes and the manual comes with tons of recipes and ideas! If you owned a previous ninja I would even recommend this because the auto IQ blend makes a better consistency especially for shakes!
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Mighty Ninja
customer_reviews.text: This compact Ninja works great - fast and gets the job done - totally! Love It! Have one myself and bought this for my Granddaughter at college. She loves it, she and all her room mates use it every day too! It is amazing and so worth the price! It was better than she ever expected (she has had other ones and none work like this!) and shipped fast and came sooner than she expected! Yes!!! Love Our Ninjas!!!! Makes it quick and easy to drink/eat healthy!
customer_reviews.author: K. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Works Nicely So Far
customer_reviews.text: We are in a habit of making smoothies every so often. I put in milk, Greek yogurt, frozen banana, pineapple, blue berries, sometimes an ice cube, and I put in cut up dates for more sweetness. The dates can be hard for some machines. This guy does a great job. Two keys, don't fill too full, put plenty of liquid. If the ingredients seem to get stuck there may not be enough liquid.
customer_reviews.author: T. Haynes

customer_reviews.title: After 3 months, mine smells like a dead animal!
customer_reviews.text: I bought my Nutri Ninja Bullet on June 28,2020. Here it is, September 28, and I am going to have to get rid of it. I wash the cup and the blade every morning after use with very hot water and liquid detergent and 2-3 times a week I run it through the dish washer. I have even poured vinegar onto the lid and let it sit for 15 minutes. And you know what, it still smells like ROAD KILL, seriously. $80 down the drain. Disgusting.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa W.

customer_reviews.title: Love this, but missing a container upon delivery
customer_reviews.text: I have had a ninja of my own for 4+ years and it works great! Love it for making smoothies, marinades, salad dressings etc. I just ordered my niece one but it arrived with only 2 of the containers. The large 32 oz container is missing. I plan to call product support for help. I tried to use the online link for support but it takes me to a Shark product registration website. I am hoping Amazon will help.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Price

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely great blender
customer_reviews.text: I originally purchased this smoothy blender for our RV. We have had 2 other brands and both broke. Since I have had great luck with Ninja blender at our home, I thought this would be great. Well now I want to purchase a second one. I have been using this at home until our next RV trip. Leaving it in the RV I miss it at home. I like using this for smoothies much better than my large ninja blender. Simpler to clean and very quick. I did purchase the 32oz bottle so I can make smoothies for both myself and husband at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Rzr Girl

customer_reviews.title: Awesome individual blender!
customer_reviews.text: Better upgrade to my 10 yr old Ninja! It’s a blender so it will be loud but it’s really powerful and fast.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It just...works
customer_reviews.text: So I've had other blenders, including compact single cup models from other manufacturers. This is better than each and every one of them. It has an "intelligent" cycle that senses the working load on the blades and adapts to match. It's sturdy enough to handle pretty much anything I've thrown at it/into it and fits netly in my limited counter space. What more can one ask of a "personal blender" This is the best there is in the category.
customer_reviews.author: Earl Baum

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase I have made all quarantine... quite loud, though
customer_reviews.text: This product is phenomenal. The Ninja has incredible power and accomplishes everything I need it to. My one issue with it is that it is egregiously loud. Though I am happy compromising my ears for blending power, this may be tough for some who are trying to make a smoothie and leave the house quietly. Try throwing a blanket or towel over it and that could help, but only so much. Nonetheless, this product makes efficient morning breakfasts, post-workout meals, and other mixers. 9.5/10. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Burke

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!!! Blender smoking. Potential fire hazard!
customer_reviews.text: Blender arrived today and I started using and started smoking already!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Samyra Graham

customer_reviews.title: blends anything you throw at it.
customer_reviews.text: 've used other ninja products in the past and this one is no different in that it does what it's supposed to do. Chops up any and everything you throw at it. Yes it is load but all blenders seem to be when you have a motor of this size. Recommend to anyone as smoothies come out perfect. ice, frozen fruit and all else get diced and sliced to perfection
customer_reviews.author: Marc Wilcox

customer_reviews.title: Great blender no question, powerful for sure, quick to blend but loud!
customer_reviews.text: Great blender no pouring into the coup, had the older model this is better. Cups it comes with not so great but can order better cups for measuring. Had the old model this ones better for sure. Very strong but very loud doesn’t bother me but if people are sleeping might not wanna use it at those times. Love this product all together and good price! Takes away the extra step of blender cleaning that and then cup and cleaning that! Just gotta clean the screw on blade part and put a cap on the blender cup ready to go.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: We needed more smoothie power
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice upgrade from our previous Ninja. My daughter recently discovered that she too likes to make smoothies. The smaller one wasn't going to survive my daughter's rough treatment, so an upgrade was necessary. Yes, it's noisy. I turn it on, walk away and do something else for a couple of minutes--no big deal. I suppose it has to be noisy if it is going to be powerful, which it is.
customer_reviews.author: Alynny

customer_reviews.title: great blender
customer_reviews.text: super great blender at a great price, i found it the cheapest here and it came in almost perfect condition! just a little mark on the side of it but i wasn’t expecting it to be exactly brand new because it was listed as “like new” which i think is fair! cant wait to use this daily. it is a bit loud, but it really does the job great and fast.
customer_reviews.author: melissa drabek

customer_reviews.title: LUV this blender.
customer_reviews.text: I make smoothies everyday and this blender is great. I can load the cup, press blend and walk away to do something else and return to a perfectly blended smoothie. Blends ice well with no large chunks floating in my drink. Bought an extra 24 oz cup for my granddaughter and she luvs it too. Make and go with the attached lid. My only complaint would be how loud it is when blending, but it is worth the noise.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lawnmower or Blender?
customer_reviews.text: I read a ton of reviews saying it was loud. I know blenders are loud so I continued with my order. However, this sounds like a lawnmower is right by your head. I typically don’t complain and deal with things, but I can’t with this. It was too loud and also didn’t blendet things quite well. So overall disappointed, but I was warned
customer_reviews.author: Jaimie

customer_reviews.title: It is a very powerful blending machine but yes very noisy too
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with the powerful machine. Does it's job better than most of the other brands. It is, however, very very very noisy like you got a trunk or airplane on your table. Feels like electric drill when operates. But you have this IQ thing, so you can just go away to another room and hide until it's done.
customer_reviews.author: Merzhu

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Loud, Louder than you would believe
customer_reviews.text: Blends great but it is the loudest machine ever built. Like louder than a leaf blower. I live in an apartment and am on a liquid diet. Every time I have to make a protein shake I feel so bad for my neighbors.
customer_reviews.author: E.C.

customer_reviews.title: Noisy but good
customer_reviews.text: Very very loud. If you need to make smoothies in the morning or without waking people this is not the one. But, it's super easy to clean, destroys almost anything I have put in it (in a good way). The memory feature is really neat as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loud but Powerful
customer_reviews.text: This blender is very very powerful. I have no issues blending anything that i put in it. I love that it’s a smart blender and really makes sure that everything is blended well. The only issue i have is that it’s soooooo noisy. The motor in this thing sounds like a jumbo jet. It makes it difficult to use at night when I’m trying to make a smoothie to get the remainder of my calories. I’ll wake up the entire house.
customer_reviews.author: GP Bookmark Kid

customer_reviews.title: My wife loves that I’m eating fruit.
customer_reviews.text: Everyday, as I make my quarantine smoothie, my wife says, “remember when you didn’t eat a piece of fruit for ten years?” Smoothies made in my ninja have replaced toast from my homemade sourdough and my body is diggin it. Tastes good, feels good. My only critique is that this blender is loud as a jet engine in my concrete encased nyc apartment kitchen. Maybe buy ear plugs. 5/5
customer_reviews.author: Prop Josh

customer_reviews.title: yes, it's LOUD
customer_reviews.text: I've only used this for about two weeks but compared to my 10+ years old magic bullet, it is a huge step up. It's been hot lately, so I've been making smoothies almost everyday and this blender gives my smoothies such a creamy texture. It really is loud- it pierces my ears so I have to hit start and walk away.
customer_reviews.author: MINJI LEE

customer_reviews.title: Love it with exception of lining
customer_reviews.text: Only problem is the inner rubber lining that tends to foul. I usually pry them out to clean but the rubbers integrity is starting to show after constantly being pulled out
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: Love this blender! I purchased another ninja a few years ago that needs the cup inserted and then press to activate blender. Works great, but I love that I can load this new blender and press a button..walk away for 60 seconds and come back and it’s perfectly blended. I’ve used some other cheaper blenders in the past, but the ninja crushes ice like it’s nothing. No chunks! Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Powerful personal size blender
customer_reviews.text: Handles basic smoothies no problem. Not a 100% efficient when there are things like broccoli involved (more like 95%) in the smoothie. It is a little noisy; the preset settings are great and seem to work well; they take the guesswork out how long to blend for and including a pause to allow things to settle in the blender is clever. The blades are very sharp. The lids, cups, and blades are all dishwasher safe. Also used to make the batter for a dutch baby which worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Shipman

customer_reviews.title: Powerful blender
customer_reviews.text: Works exactly as it was described. I I have been using it for tomatoes and strawberries, it’s perfect I like the IQ function the most.. I only wish there was a bigger size if I need to blend tomato soup at once. Now I have to split into 3-4 portions, that’s the reason why I have only 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Lubka

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use but a little underpowered
customer_reviews.text: Been using it over a month daily to make a green shake using veggies and fruits. Very easy to use and once I bought 32oz cups I can make shakes for 2. My main complaint is that it's underpowered and most time needs another minute on top of its automatic extract plan. Other than that it's cheap and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: djairo

customer_reviews.title: Powerful blender
customer_reviews.text: Strong blender. Blends really well. It is a bit loud but works great. I knocked off a star because every time I open the blender it sprays out- not sure if this is because I go close to the max fill line. I would just be careful to open over a sink and away from your clothes. You’ll also want to wipe the top of the cup so it doesn’t drip if you are just popping a straw in to drink a smoothie.
customer_reviews.author: AMH

customer_reviews.title: WAY TOO LOUD AND DOESNT MEASURE UP TO NUTRIBULLET.
customer_reviews.text: Decided to try this after my NutriBullet died. I read reviews about how loud this item but I thought “how loud can it be?” Well, it’s almost unbearable! Would love to blend a smoothie in our travel trailer when camping but this is truly so loud, I don’t have the heart to wake up other campers blending a smoothie in the mornings (keep in mind we don’t tent camp but have an enclosed trailer). It also doesn’t seem to fully blend frozen fruit (esp bananas) well. Will continue to use this at home until it’s death. Then will go back to my NutriBullet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Powerful
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my son. I have the Nutri ninja auto iq 72 oz blender duo and he loved it and said he was going to miss it because he and his girlfriend love their smoothies and shakes. I bought this one for them and they were elated. Powerful. Smoothies and shakes come out smooth and frothy.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne M Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Powerful blender
customer_reviews.text: Yes the blender may be a little bit loud but it is so powerful who cares. It is really easy to clean the blades, most of the time you can just rinse it under the sink. The best part about it that I like is that you know that it is in there when you push down and it clicks and locks it in. Others have complained about the suction cups but they really aren't that bad, they actually will release pretty easily if you just Tip It Forward slowly.
customer_reviews.author: mike j

customer_reviews.title: LOUD!
customer_reviews.text: Geez! The reviews warned me! But, GeeZ! It is really LOUD! The thing works like a charm and is very easy to clean. However, I recommend EAR PLUGs. :)
customer_reviews.author: LMF

customer_reviews.title: Great blender, just loud
customer_reviews.text: Wanted a blender for smoothies and after reading many reviews decided on this one. Loving it so far, it has blended perfectly with no chunks and is very powerful but stays put on the counter via suction cups that work very well. As many other reviews have mentioned, with all that power come a lot of noise! This blender is loud. It does not bother me but if you were making smoothies in the morning with others asleep I could see it being frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa B

product_meta.title: Ninja BL480D Nutri 1000 Watt Auto-IQ Base for Juices, Shakes & Smoothies Personal Blender, 18 and 24 oz, Black/Silver
product_meta.description: The Nutri Ninja with Auto iQ takes the guesswork out of drink making. Auto IQ technology features intelligent programs that combine unique timed pulsing, blending and pausing patterns that do the work for you. The digital countdown timer displays how much time is remaining on the selected Auto iQ program or counts up to track blending time when using the two manual speeds. Each preprogrammed setting is designed to do the work for you and deliver consistent and delicious drinks with powerful nutrient and Vitamin extraction at the touch of a button. Combined with Nutri Ninja Pro Extractor blades, Auto iQ breaks down whole fruits, vegetables, ice and seeds for powerful nutrient and Vitamin extraction. 18oz and 24oz Nutri Ninja Cups with spout lids allow you to make nutritious juices and smoothies to take on the go. All parts are BPA free and dishwasher safe.
feature_bullets: Auto IQ technology optimizes ninja: Pro extractor blades and power to deliver powerful nutrient and vitamin extraction
Powerful nutrient and vitamin extraction provides great tasting, nutritious beverages
1000 watt motor has the power to crush through whole fruits, vegetables and ice in seconds

Nutri ninja pro extractor blades rotate at high speed to liquefy ingredients into smooth nutrient juices, smoothies and purees. Use a damp cloth to wipe the motor base clean. Never submerge the motor base in water

Includes: (1) small 18 ounce Nutri ninja cup, (1) regular 24 ounce Nutri ninja cup, (2) sip & seal lids, (1) pro extractor blades, instruction book, getting started guide with product tips and recipes

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars4,017 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
